definition: of amnesia, get worse or fall back to a previous condition
details:
adjective
- of amnesia
= synonyms: anterograde
- moving or directed or tending in a backward direction or contrary to a previous direction
= synonyms: retral
- moving from east to west on the celestial sphere
- going from better to worse
= synonyms: retrogressive
verb
- get worse or fall back to a previous condition
= synonyms: regress
- go back over
= example: go back over
= synonyms: rehash, hash over
- move back
= example: move back
= synonyms: retreat
- move in a direction contrary to the usual one
- move backward in an orbit, of celestial bodies
